text: The Reader is a 2008 German-American romantic drama movie. It stars Ralph Fiennes as Michael Berg and Kate Winslet as Hanna Schmitz. It was directed by Stephen Daldry, produced by Anthony Minghella and Sydney Pollack and written by David Hare. It is based on a 1995 German novel. The Reader was nominated for many Academy Awards, including a Best Picture nomination. Winslet won an Academy Award, a BAFTA Award and a Golden Globe Award for her role. == Other websites == * Category:2008 romantic drama movies Category:Academy Award winning movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:BAFTA Award winning movies Category:2000s English-language movies Category:German-language movies Category:German romance movies Category:German drama movies Category:Golden Globe Award winning movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies set in the 1950s Category:Movies set in the 1960s Category:Movies set in the 1980s Category:Movies set in the 1990s
title: The Reader
